flobr 0.0.0.9004
  • Reference

Unflob to File

Source: R/flob.R
unflob.Rd

Converts a flob back to its original file format.

unflob(flob, path)

Arguments

flob

The flob to save to file.
path

A string of the path to the new file.

Value

An invisible string of the path to the saved file.

Details

If path does not include an extension then it is added automatically. If path does include an extension and then it must match the flob's extension.

See also

flobr
